verbs.description: sunday brunch casserole [ARG1: my father] [V: was] [ARG2: a chef] and this was one of his favorite recipes he served it in the hotels where he worked as well as at home whenever it served today in my home it never fails to bring back fond memories of a table laden with food and encircled with family and friends enjoying the aromas tastes and laughter —roy lyon coupeville washington —roy lyon coupeville coupeville washington washington roy lyon
